definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Memphis (Eg. Mr-nfr, i.e. Mĕ nnūfĕ r, *Mĕ nnūfĕ , Steindorff:BAS i. 594 f.; As. Mêmpi, Mimpi Schr:COT Is 19:13 Dl:Par. 314; cf. Erman Ægypten 48, 243 Eb:Cicerone i. 114 f.; LXX (and Gk) Memfiv, on coins Menfi(v) Steind. l. c.);—´[[מ]] Ho 9:6 = [[נׁף]] Is 19:13, Je 2:16, Je 44:1, Je 46:14, Je 46:19, Ez Eze 30:13, and [[יוֹמָם וְנׁף חָרֵי]] v:Eze 30:16 (without clear meaning, prob. txt. err. Siegfr:in Kau; LXX (appar.) [[וְנׇפׂחוּ מֵימֵיהֶם]] and their waters shall be disperesed (cf. Na 3:8); Co [[חומותיה ונפרחו]] and its walls shall be torn down); [[נׁף]] also v:Eze 30:15 (for MT [[נא]]) LXX Co.
